response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This unique item holds immense value to me, not only due to its intrinsic qualities but also because of the passion and dedication that went into its creation. I believe it could be a significant asset or addition to your collection, bringing both utility and prestige.

Considering the exceptional nature of this product, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at a price of $500,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and the potential appreciation of the product's value over time.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 500000}
